testing.name: Ukrainian lands in the Austrian and Russian empires in the early nineteenth century. Subdivisions in the first 50 years of the nineteenth century.

question.text: What region of Ukraine at the beginning of the nineteenth century. was the most populated?
Centered on the province in the early nineteenth century. was Zhitomir?
What was the name of the historical and geographical region that was inhabited by the Black Sea Cossacks?
How many provinces existed in the Ukrainian lands in the Russian Empire in the mid-nineteenth century.?
What are the Ukrainian lands were "Kingdom of Galicia and Lodomeria" within the Austrian Empire at the beginning of the nineteenth century.?

answer.text: Eastern Galicia, northern Bukovina, Transcarpathia, Volhynia

question.text: Which province was formed in the former Hetmanate in 1802?
